CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): Moved from A.2.3.1 (AE Reporter)
E2B (R3): C.5.2 Study Name Conformance: Optional Data Type: 2000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text, nullFlavor: ASKU, NASK
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element should be populated with the study name as registered in the jurisdiction where the ICSR is reported.
CustomField.label: Study Name
